name: Starfox 64 3D E3 Video
description: Fox McCloud is back in a re-mastered Nintendo classic. Play as legendary Fox McCloud and lead your fearless squadron of wing-men into fierce laser blasting aerial combat against the evil forces of Andross. Rich 3D visuals provide a remarkable sense of depth, distance, and position while dodging meteors and blasting enemy fighters out of the sky. New features such as motion controls and new multiplayer options allow longtime fans and newcomers alike to discover the excitement of the Starfox universe.
